summary: A simple mod that expands the options for enchantments on certain items.
descriptionHtml:
Expanded Enchantment Equipment (EEE)

Master Files: Skyrim.esm


	By: Zutra (aka Mesh)



A simple mod that expands the options for enchantments on certain items. Now you can
enchant nearly all equipable clothes, rings armor, with any enchantment you wish on
it. Works with almost all vanilla enchantments and equipment.




To Install: Download with NMM and activate it. Or download manually, and put the esp in:
C:\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\Steam\\\\SteamApps\\\\common\\\\Skyrim\\\\Data

To use: simply grab your favorite peice of clothing, or jewlery, and enchant it at any enchantment table.




Note that this only works for any Fortify/Resist enchantment, Muffle, Waterbreathing, 
Health/Magicka/Stamina and regen enchantments. The only limitations are your enchantment
skill level and your currently used Soul Gem.



Mod Conflicts: Any mod that modifies the FormLists of vanilla enchantments.



For Modders:

	Keywords that work in the Creation Kit:

		ArmorBoots
		ArmorClothing (this works for all keywords with the prefix: Clothing as well)
		ArmorDarkBrotherhood
		ArmorGaunlets
		ArmorHeavy
		ArmorHelmet
		ArmorJewlery
		ArmorLight
		ArmorNighingale
		ArmorShield

	Any new equipment that have these keywords, should work just fine with
the vanilla enchantments. New enchantments needs them added through the FormLists
thats attatched to your custom enchantment.




Any questions, comments? Anything I may have missed? Please let me know (PM or comment)!
author: Zutra
